thread.title: Lala Kent Reveals Her Due Date For Second Baby
thread.title_full: Lala Kent Reveals Her Due Date For Second Baby

author: Hailee Dent
title: Lala Kent Reveals Her Due Date For Second Baby
text: Lala Kent recently revealed the due date for her second baby. She is pregnant by doing IUI treatments and a sperm donor. This has been an amazing experience for her. She did not want to depend on finding someone to have another baby with. It is not in her books right now to have another baby daddy. She also expressed that she wanted to have holidays to herself and not have to share them with the baby daddy who is not in her life anymore. She has become a role model to many single women who want a child but do not have a partner. Lala Kent Gets Pregnant On First Try Lala Kent started by getting her IUD out and tracking her ovulation cycle. She then started her IUI treatments after picking out her sperm donor. Lala was extremely lucky as she got pregnant on her first try. This was not expected by her or her doctor. She then went on to tell her daughter Ocean she was going to be a big sister. Ocean was confused at first but eventually understood and seemed excited . She did have to clarify with her mom, Lala, that she did not have a baby in her belly, only Lala. However, Lala is ready to have this baby and feels ready with all of the support she has. She Revealed Her Due Date Lala Kent recently revealed the due date of her second baby. It is September 1, 2024, which is one day before Lala’s birthday. She revealed this information on the after-show with Brittany Cartwright. She does not yet know the gender of the baby but plans to find out as soon as she can. “We don’t know what we’re having quite yet. I mean my group, my communal… So I’ll find out in a couple of weeks. My due date is September 1, which is so wild because my birthday is September 2,” She has a huge amount of support with her friends and family. It seems as though Lala could be having her second baby on her birthday. That may be her best birthday present yet. She is ecstatic to have another child. Her daughter Ocean is also excited to be a big sister. Lala has an enormous amount of support surrounding her and does not need a partner to have another baby. She has many friends and family who will help her along the way. What do you think about her journey?
